    • Method Detail

      • trim

        public static <T extends org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation> T trim(T annotation,
                                                                      char... ws)
        trims the annotated text. Similar to String.trim(), this method moves the begin and end indexes towards the middle as long as there is whitespace. The method throws a ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if the entire annotation consists of whitespace.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The annotation type
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation to trim
        ws - An array of chars that are to be considered whitespace
        Returns:
        The trimmed annotation (not a copy)
        Since:
        0.4.1

      • trim

        public static <T extends org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation> T trim(T annotation)
        This method first checks whether the string contains whitespace at all. See also trim(Annotation, char...)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the annotation type
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation to trim
        Returns:
        the trimmed annotation
        Since:
        0.4.1

      • trim

        public static <T extends org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation> void trim(Collection<T> annotations)
        trims an entire collection of annotations. Beware: directly trimming the result of JCasUtil.select(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas, Class) throws a ConcurrentModificationException.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the annotation type
        Parameters:
        annotations - The annotations you want to trim
        Since:
        0.4.1

      • trimFront

        @Deprecated
public static <T extends org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation> T trimFront(T annotation,
                                                                                       char... ws)
        Deprecated. 
        Moves the begin-index as long as a character contain in the array is at the beginning.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the annotation type
        Parameters:
        annotation - the annotation to be trimmed
        ws - an array of chars to be trimmed
        Returns:
        the trimmed annotation
        Since:
        0.4.1

      • trimBegin

        public static <T extends org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation> T trimBegin(T annotation,
                                                                           char... ws)
        Moves the begin-index as long as a character contain in the array is at the beginning.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the annotation type
        Parameters:
        annotation - the annotation to be trimmed
        ws - an array of chars to be trimmed
        Returns:
        the trimmed annotation
        Since:

      • trimEnd

        public static <T extends org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation> T trimEnd(T annotation,
                                                                         char... ws)
        Moves the end-index as long a character that is contained in the array is at the end.
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation to be trimmed.
        ws - An array of characters which are considered whitespace
        Returns:
        The trimmed annotation
        Since:
        0.4.2
